title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-1.13 - Tank Systems Subject to These Regulations in the Future
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-1.13 - Tank Systems Subject to These Regulations in the Future

State Regulations

Any tank system which becomes subject to these
regulations in the future must comply with the requirements of this Part within
the time frame specified or within two years of becoming subject to regulation, whichever is later. This might occur if a substance is added to the list of
hazardous substances in Part 597 of this Title. Any new equipment must comply
with this Part when installed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
598-1.13

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 29, eff. 10/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
